subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Nextel Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar took 25 championship points away from Carl Edwards because his car failed an inspection Sunday after he won a Nextel Cup series race at Dover International Speedway in Delaware.
snippet: Nascar took 25 championship points away from Carl Edwards because his car failed an inspection Sunday after he won a Nextel Cup series race at Dover International Speedway in Delaware.
